description: Retrieves a list of workflows in a specified project.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Information used to sort the items in the returned list. (dict) --- Information used to sort workflows in the returned list.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token returned from a call to this API to indicate the next batch of results to return, if any.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: Information about the workflows in a project.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of a workflow.

nested_items.name: sourceRepositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the source repository where the workflow definition file is stored.

nested_items.name: sourceBranchName
nested_items.description: The name of the branch of the source repository where the workflow definition file is stored.

nested_items.name: definition
nested_items.description: Information about the workflow definition file.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The path to the workflow definition file stored in the source repository for the project, including the file name.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the workflow was created, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the workflow was last updated, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339

nested_items.name: runMode
nested_items.description: The run mode of the workflow.
